name: Music_4501.wav
caption: This is an instrument showcase jam. It is an electronic music piece played on a drum machine. There is a booming electronic drum beat in the rhythmic background. There is a medium-to-high pitch melodic pad repeating the same tune. The sound of the piece is crisp and loud. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a fast-paced video game in the arcade genre. It could also be playing in the background during breaks at a sports venue.
